channel.title: OblivionRealm||Need Staff||508 Maps||Dicing||PVP ||New Items||Perfect Switching
channel.description:
[IMG]http://d2bm3ljpacyxu8.cloudfront.net/width/549/oblivionrealm.webs.com/cooltext742271413.png[/img]
Website: http://Oblivionrealm.webs.com/apps/forums/ Webclient: http://Oblivionrealm.webs.com/webclient-2 Client download: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/54825351/oblivion.jar Vote: http://www.google.com/toplist/vote-16358.html
OblivionRealm started in February this year by me, Evan. I've been coding it off and on and have done a lot of stuff to the source. I'm open for suggestions on what to add in the near future. I hope to start a great community with this server and hopefully finish my goals.
-Evan
Staff: Owner - Evan Co-Owner - Open Admin - Livevil Admin - Open Mod - Open Mod - Open Mod - Open
Features: -New level up 99 get cash! -Vote4Cash -Custom Construction -GWD -All Skills working -Flawless switching -508 Maps -Dicing -New items -Money pouch fully working -No Dupes -Godswords,Dclaws,Korasi fully working -All Nex armours -Loyalty titles -Donator points -Fair EXP rate -Lots of fun!
Npcs: -Bork -GWD Bosses -Corp -Jad -All Strykewyms -Dagannoth Kings -Barrows
Items: -Torva -Pernix -Virtus -Max Cape -New Bandos -Completionist Cape -Tokhaar-kal -Chaotics -Spirit Shields -Working Ring of Vigour -Vesta -Statius -Steadfast, Ragefire, Glaiven Boots
Media: [center]Drops Vesta, Statius, Steadfast boots ect [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/xq9z4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/amrrjk.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/28km49u.jpg[/img]

[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/294ky02.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/vga8.png[/img]
There's tons of more content!
[size=12pt][u][b]IF you need help with anything add my skype: EvanBennettSkype Or go on Forums and post![/b][/u][/size][/center]

Website: http://Oblivionrealm.webs.com/apps/forums/
Webclient: http://Oblivionrealm.webs.com/webclient-2
Client download: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/54825351/oblivion.jar
Vote: http://www.google.com/toplist/vote-16358.html

OblivionRealm started in February this year by me, Evan.
I’ve been coding it off and on and have done a lot of stuff to the source.
I’m open for suggestions on what to add in the near future.
I hope to start a great community with this server and hopefully finish my goals.

-Evan

Co-Owner - Open
